meanings.definition: A written or printed copy of a manuscript or document.
meanings.sent1: I always keep a typescripts of my favorite stories in a special folder.
meanings.sent2: The librarian handed me a typescripts of the ancient scroll to study.
meanings.sent3: The detective found a typescripts of the secret plans hidden in the old book.
meanings.sent4: Her room was filled with typescripts of her dreams and memories, neatly organized.
meanings.sent5: The typescripts of the ancient map revealed hidden treasures beyond imagination.

meanings.definition: To produce a typescript of a document.
meanings.sent1: She typescripts all her notes to keep them organized and easy to read.
meanings.sent2: The secretary typescripts the meeting minutes for everyone to review later.
meanings.sent3: The robot typescripts the messages with lightning speed, impressing everyone.
meanings.sent4: His fingers moved swiftly on the keyboard, typescripting the report in record time.
meanings.sent5: The author typescripts the final chapter, bringing the story to a satisfying conclusion.
